analyzed: skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / dpal h'um mdzad chen po des me 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs te rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas brgya byin la seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas glang po che 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te h'um h'um h'um gi
translated: With the gait of a majestic elephant, he took three steps and recited the mantra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

analyzed: de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: snying rje'i yid kyis brgya byin nyon //

original: skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams //

analyzed: mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce'i rgyud //

analyzed: bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med pa; ;ngas bshad khyod kyi yid kyis zungs //

analyzed: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa nang gi mchod pas mchod do //

analyzed: 'khor la las lha mo dang / gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod do //

analyzed: de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: khro chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //

original: drag po h'um mdzad rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: drag po h'um mdzad rdo rje 'dzin //

analyzed: de nas dpal lha mo ni /

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa srung ba ni / sngon sh'akya @344a *//
